text: N’imirwi y’abantu twarayiteguriye ahantu h’ibagiro ry’ivyo bitungwa vyabo bijanye n’amasengesho, kugira ngo bahayagize izina ry’Imana kubijanye nivyo bikoko bifise amaguru ane, rero Imana yanyu n’Imana imwe yonyene rudende, rero nimuce bugufi cane kuriyo, kandi mubabwire inkuru nziza kubantu bagamburukira Imana yabo
